sentences.en: A: The most common for all of us is probably the mechanization and heavy dependency on technology.
sentences.cn: 解答：最常见的可能就是机械化带来的一些结果和我们对于科技的过度依赖。

sentences.en: Abstract: with the mine production mechanization degree unceasing enhancement, as a traditional method of coal blasting fall coal mining machinery has gradually be replaced.
sentences.cn: 摘要：随着煤矿生产机械化程度的不断提高，作为传统采煤方法的爆破落煤已逐渐被机械采煤所代替。

sentences.en: And traditional hand - operation of banking has been transferred into mechanization, semi - automation and automation.
sentences.cn: 而传统的手工操作的银行业务已经转换为机械化 、 半自动化、全自动化.

sentences.en: Direct seeding reduces the cost of production and lends itself to mechanization.
sentences.cn: 直接播种可降低生产成本,也容易机械化.

sentences.en: Farm mechanization is agricultural modernization main content and important sign.
sentences.cn: 农业机械化是农业现代化的主要内容和重要标志.

sentences.en: Mechanization happened years ago on the farms of Islay.
sentences.cn: 数年前，艾莱的农场就实现了机械化。

sentences.en: Mechanization has contributed to the consolidation of farms in larger holdings.
sentences.cn: 机械化已使大型农场得到了巩固.

sentences.en: Mechanization of the harvest rate of 40 %, agricultural mechanization rate of 95 %.
sentences.cn: 机械化收割率达40%, 农田机械化率达95%.

sentences.en: Mechanization opens the way for skilled jobs in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 机械化为农业的技术工种开辟了道路.

sentences.en: That province has achieved outstanding results in farm mechanization.
sentences.cn: 该省农业机械化的工作成效卓著.

sentences.en: The breathtaking potentialities of mechanization set the minds of manufacturers and merchants on fire.
sentences.cn: 机械化的惊人潜力使制造厂和商人们激动不已。

sentences.en: The developed electronic - actuator was used to realize its mechanization.
sentences.cn: 应用电子操动系统来实现其机械化工程,并给出了计算模型.

sentences.en: The fundamental way out for agriculture lies in mechanization.
sentences.cn: 农业的根本出路在于机械化.

sentences.en: There is a very high degree of mechanization in farming.
sentences.cn: 农业开垦已高度机械化.

sentences.en: This mechanization is not entirely realistic.
sentences.cn: 这个力学化情况并不是完全真实的.

sentences.en: We are determined to realize the mechanization in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 我们决心实现农业机械化.

sentences.en: We are speeding up the mechanization of our agriculture.
sentences.cn: 我们正在加快农业机械化的步伐。
